thread.section_title: Vermont Farm Table Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vermont Farm Table | vermontfarmtable.com
thread.title: Sam B
thread.title_full: Vermont Farm Table reviewed by Sam B

author: Sam B
title: Sam B
text: Chris at Vermont Farm Table helped us figure out what we really wanted and needed. He applied no pressure and really made the process go smoothly. He even sent photos of the table as it was in progress. The table is just beautiful and so well made. It is the kind of thing that will be in the family for generations. We can't wait for all the fun we will have around it. I will be appreciating its beauty every day
